snippet.title: The Scavenger diaries - New Entry - AFTERGLOW
snippet.description:
Once again, there is news! 



To all the new subscribers, welcome to the channel. I know it's not very active, but all the new updates come here first. For all the previous supporters, thank you very much for keeping your subscription. This is a short progress video detailing some of the work so far on episode 2 of Ashes - Ashes: Afterglow. Now in authentic VHS quality!!!!1!!


You can keep up to date with all the work and complain about my terrible ideas on the forum page, here:
https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=19&t=69612


A big thank you to WolfseyeRio and JessyRuiz for the help with the vocal work for this video. 



And thank you all once again. I wouldn't be here without all the incredible support this project has received.




ASHES: AFTERGLOW is the second episode of a planned series. Based on the Gzdoom source port.
